introduction.quote: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz. Currently serves as an investigator in the Adventurers' Guild.Through her unique abilities, eccentric character, and (while she would never admit it herself) hard work, Fischl has become a rising star among the Adventurers' Guild's investigators, earning the recognition of all.
introduction.content: Fischl is a playable Electro  character in Genshin Impact. Fischl is an investigator for Mondstadt's Adventurers' Guild, accompanied by the night raven Oz. Fischl claims to hail from a world beyond Teyvat. She is a daring adventurer with seemly outlandish theories that happen to turn out to be true.

personality.quote: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.
content:
Due to her upbringing as a child, Fischl is obsessed with fantasy stories and roleplays as a benevolent princess. She speaks in a polite and formal manner to all, which greatly confuses those who interact with her. For this purpose, Oz ends up translating most of her speech if they are confused. She is used to speaking this way that even breaking character ends up confusing them just as much.
This roleplay often results in most people having a negative view of her outside of guild duties, but she is not dismayed by this and continues roleplaying regardless of what others think of it. She has very few friends and appreciates those who are willing to go along with her roleplay.
Outside of roleplaying, she is a kind and well-behaved girl. She gets along well with her parents, even if she doesn't spend much time with them or they disagree with some of her decisions, but they tend to respect her enough that they comply with whatever she requests. Lisa, who generally gets in a bad mood when people neglect the books they borrow from the library, states that Fischl always keeps the books she borrows in good condition and returns them early. She tends not to dwell too much on the past, seeing herself as Fischl, not as her true identity, who she considers a different person.
Fischl also has a knack for investigating in part due to her own theories and Oz, which has allowed her to quickly climb up the ranks of the Adventurer's Guild. Even when her ideas sound outlandish (such as claiming a meteor shower to be the result of a curse), Oz is quick to ask others not to underestimate her intuition, as her instincts are very keen.
She enjoys Mitternachtsbrot des Sommernachtgartens and despises Sweet Madame, claiming that it has been mutilated by "unnatural bondage" and that it resembles her homeworld's hell.

appearance:
Fischl has blonde hair, light green eyes, and a petite build with fair skin. Two sections of her hair are tied into twin tails with a black ribbon, the left of which is decorated with a bat wing pattern. Fischl wears a black eyepatch that is worn to not obstruct her view when possessing Oz.
Overall, Fischl seems to have designed her outfit to be as asymmetrical as physically possible. She wears a sleeveless black lace dress-like leotard with a black lace collar and purple bow tie, crosses stitched in, and black and violet tailcoats. However, hidden under her hair reveals a black tattoo of wings. Fischl's vision is tied to the back of this dress with a bat wing-style purple ribbon. She wears a shoulder-length black glove on her left hand and a black and purple sleeve on her right arm. Fischl wears a transparent black stocking on her right leg and a similar thigh-high black sock held up by a garter on her left. Fischl wears black boots with a light purple lining, gold heels, and bat wing decorations.
In general, Fischl seems to style herself after the titular character of the book "Flowers for Princess Fischl." Her outfit, Dunkelnacht Sakrament, is described to be the Prinzessin Der Verurteilung's customary vestments during her sojourn upon this realm.

talents.name: Bolts of Downfall
talents.desc:
Normal Attack: Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
Charged Attack: Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, the dark lightning spirits of Immernachtreich shall heed the call of their Prinzessin and indwell the enchanted arrowhead. When fully indwelt, the Rachsüchtig Blitz shall deal immense Electro DMG.
Plunging Attack: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Nightrider
talents.desc:
Summons Oz. The night raven forged of darkness and lightning descends upon the land, dealing Electro DMG in a small AoE.
For the ability's duration, Oz will continuously attack nearby opponents with Freikugel.
Hold to adjust the location Oz will be summoned to.
Press again any time during the ability's duration to once again summon him to Fischl's side.

talents.name: Midnight Phantasmagoria
talents.desc:
Summons Oz to spread his twin wings of twilight and defend Fischl. Has the following properties during the ability's duration:
Fischl takes on Oz's form, greatly increasing her Movement Speed.
Strikes nearby opponents with lightning, dealing Electro DMG to opponents she comes in contact with. Each opponent can only be struck once.
Once this ability's effects end, Oz will remain on the battlefield and attack his Prinzessin's foes. If Oz is already on the field, then this will reset the duration of his presence.

talents.name: Stellar Predator
talents.desc: When Fischl hits Oz with a fully-charged Aimed Shot, Oz brings down Thundering Retribution, dealing AoE Electro DMG equal to 152.7% of the arrow's DMG.

talents.name: Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex
talents.desc: If your active character triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction when Oz is on the field, the opponent shall be stricken with Thundering Retribution, dealing Electro DMG equal to 80% of Fischl's ATK.

talents.name: Mein Hausgarten
talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellation.name: Gaze of the Deep
constellation.effect: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl performs a Normal Attack against an opponent, Oz fires a joint attack, dealing DMG equal to 22% of Fischl's ATK.

constellation.name: Devourer of All Sins
constellation.effect: When Nightrider is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

constellation.name: Wings of Nightmare
constellation.effect: Increases the Level of Nightrider by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellation.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
constellation.effect: When Midnight Phantasmagoria is used, it deals 222% of ATK as Electro DMG to surrounding opponents.When the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

constellation.name: Against the Fleeing Light
constellation.effect: Increases the Level of Midnight Phantasmagoria by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellation.name: Evernight Raven
constellation.effect: Extends the duration of Oz's presence on the field by 2s. Additionally, Oz performs joint attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as Electro DMG.
